q.quote: I think every single girl has something different and special about her. You find one who clicks with your vibe.
q.author: Zac Efron

q.quote: I find that movies tend to fix the aesthetics of a story in people's minds.
q.author: Yann Martel

q.quote: The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
q.author: Xenophon

q.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
q.author: Walt Disney

q.quote: My normal life is like being on holiday.
q.author: Valentino Rossi

q.quote: My son is now an 'entrepreneur'. That's what you're called when you don't have a job.
q.author: Ted Turner

q.quote: To lovers of the truth, nothing can be put before God and hope in Him.
q.author: Saint Basil

q.quote: I don't design clothes, I design dreams.
q.author: Ralph Lauren

q.quote: I myself prefer my New Zealend eggs for breakfast
q.author: Queen Elizabeth II

q.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
q.author: Charles R. Swindoll

q.quote: It always seems impossible, until it is done.
q.author: Nelson Mandela

q.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
q.author: Steve Jobs

q.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work and learning from failure
q.author: Colin Powell

q.quote: I can resist everything except temptation
q.author: Oscar Wilde
